Line1.BAE4.Bar: Snake bites. At least he died with a blade in his hand.
Line1.BAE4.Dru: Snake venom. The poor child died quickly.
Line1.BAE4.Nec: The body is cold and covered in snake bites. It has lain here a while.
Line1.BAE4.Rog: Snakes. At least he took a few of the bastards with him. Good lad.
Line1.BAE4.Sor: The snakes must have attacked in great numbers. Poor child.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Bar: Sadness. A child has died fighting off snakes.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Dru: Sadness. A child has died fighting off snakes.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Nec: Sadness. A child has died fighting off snakes.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Rog: Sadness. A child has died fighting off snakes.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Sor: Sadness. A child has died fighting off snakes.
